banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: What does it really mean for leaders to be authentic?
videoData.socialTitle: What does it really mean for leaders to be authentic?

nodes.whoTheyAre: Herminia Ibarra, PhD is the Charles Handy professor of organizational behavior at London Business School.

videoData.description: "Be authentic" — that's what organizations, brands and people keep being told. But too often, following that advice can limit us, especially at work, says Herminia Ibarra, professor of organizational behavior. She proposes an expansive way to think about authenticity, one that will ensure we keep growing.
videoData.socialDescription: "Be authentic" — that's what organizations, brands and people keep being told. But too often, following that advice can limit us, especially at work, says Herminia Ibarra, professor of organizational behavior. She proposes an expansive way to think about authenticity, one that will ensure we keep growing.
